section.title: Ad-Hoc Configuration
section.para: You can use to specify shell commands to be run at the end of network-setup.service. This is useful for doing network configuration not covered by the existing NixOS modules. For instance, to statically configure an IPv6 address:
section.programlisting: networking.localCommands = '' ip -6 addr add 2001:610:685:1::1/64 dev eth0 '';
